hi, I'm Alsu

tldr;

user experience  design JS & CSS react webGL SVG generative art corgis accessibility teaching

long bio

I’m a UX designer & developer currently based in Montreal. I push for creativity, unusual patterns, strong tech and advocate ideas using the power of code & design.

I love anything to do with generative art, WebGL and SVGs among other things. I tend to work in React framework. Big fan of UX. Typography is my love, animation is the ultimate escape, accessibility is my trusted friend.

Outside of a browser window, I split my time between leading Canada Learning Code workshops, baking half decent vegan treats and sharing funny corgi videos.

I’m available for freelance work and short-term contracts. Booking for
